summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Moisture Surge Hydrating Supercharged Concentrate is an antioxidant-infused water-gel that gives skin an intense moisture boost.
details: DetailsBenefitsAll Skin Types.Concern: Dehydration, dry skin.Moisture Surge Hydrating Supercharged Concentrate is an antioxidant-infused water-gel serum that gives skin an intense moisture boost.This hydrating face concentrate instantly quenches dehydrated skin, and keeps skin hydrated for a full 72 hours.Liquid-Sphere Technology combines water-binding ingredients with encapsulated antioxidants.Made with a blend of hydrating ingredients with hyaluronic acid, it helps plump skin with moisture.Free Of: Fragrance, Parabens, Phthalates.Dermatologist tested. Allergy tested. 100% fragrance free.Key IngredientsHyaluronic acid fragments and activated aloe water: plump skin with moisture.Liquid-Sphere™ Technology: combines water-binding ingredients with encapsulated antioxidants.Item 2508513How To UseApply morning and night on clean skin, or anytime skin needs a moisture boost.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Phenyl Trimethicone, Propanediol, Sucrose, Hydroxyethyl Urea, Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Extract, Acetyl Glucosamine, Trehalose, Algae Extract, Caffeine, Cholesterol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Water, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Dextrin Palmitate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sorbitol, Sodium Polyaspartate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Carbomer, Dehydroxanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate, Benzophenone-4, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Citrate, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol, Red 4 (CI 14700), Yellow 5 (CI 19140).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply morning and night on clean skin, or anytime skin needs a moisture boost.

reviews.headline: I would buy these product again and again
reviews.comments: This product is what it says it will do and I enjoy it and it's not greasy like some products are

reviews.headline: My new fave!
reviews.comments: I've used Moisture Surge for years and love it. This new Supercharged Concentrate is even a step above. The hydration of this concentrate makes my foundation apply more evenly and keeps my skin moist and smooth. A nice upgrade for my skin in my older age.

reviews.headline: Soaks in…
reviews.comments: I have combo skin and very oily in my t-zone. I use this at night before I go to bed. I do wake up super oily but I feel in the morning after washing my skin is refreshed and not at bad though out the day. My skin is very moisturized. I do use a lot of products in this line. I think it help minimize fine lines and wrinkles.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Yes I believe this works well after using the moisturizer. It seems to have a nice finish.

reviews.headline: Break outs, no added moisture
reviews.comments: This broke me out with cystic acne. I was actually in denial for WEEKS that it was caused by this product so I continued to use it. Eventually I stopped using it and my face is finally beginning to clear up. Honestly, i didnt feel much of a difference with moisture either. Definitely not worth it.

reviews.headline: Gave me cystic acne
reviews.comments: I have very skin especially in the colder months. I had high hopes for this so I boughtt it and used it as directed. I began to get HUGE pimple all over my face. I stopped using it and my skin became clear again. Stick with the gel mouisterizer

reviews.headline: Game Changer
reviews.comments: I have very dry skin and struggle to find products that hydrate my skin enough and dont make my makeup look patchy. I added this to my routine and it changed my skin drastically. It leaves such a nice glow. I use clinique gentle face soap AM and PM, this AM and PM under my moisturizer. In the AM I use deamatically different moisturizer and in the PM I use the moisture surge overnight mask. Not sure if others use this alone as a moisturizer or like a serum like i do? But it works wonders.

reviews.headline: It Works!
reviews.comments: I have used Moisture Surge in it's various forms for quite a few years.  I love it and like the way my foundation goes on over it.  Don't have to wait ages for it to settle in my skin to put foundation on over it.

reviews.headline: Love this product!
reviews.comments: I have very dry skin around my nose and eye brows that is red and patchy. This has helped hydrate my skin and take away the redness. Definitely recommend for intense moisturizing

reviews.headline: I love this stuff!
reviews.comments: I have been using this for years. A great moisturizer!

reviews.headline: Beautiful hydrated under eyes
reviews.comments: I love using this day and night to hydrate and plump the skin under my eyes without looking puffy. It also is lovely all over. I'm in my early 30s with combination acne prone skin. I love trying new beauty products but I still keep reaching for this one daily.

reviews.headline: yes
reviews.comments: i just like it

reviews.headline: Gentle and love it
reviews.comments: I use this daily around my eyes. This is the only product I've found that I can put close to my eyes to help with dry patches. I feel hydrated all day

reviews.headline: The best addition to my skin care routine
reviews.comments: I chose this concentrate over the eye-specific version because I'm not a fan of coconut oil in face products and the eye concentrate contained coconut oil. In my honest opinion, with how similar the formulas are, this one is all you will ever need. It leaves my skin feeling soft, hydrated, and plump all day. It absorbs quickly and completely into the skin and the aloe has a light cooling affect that is very enjoyable to use. Combine this product with the moisture surge face spray and 100h moisturizer and you will not be disappointed. My oily dehydrated skin has never looked and felt so good.

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this product
reviews.comments: I use this product before applying foundation and before bed.  It keeps the skin hydrated very well and goes on very smooth.

reviews.headline: Best for dry skin
reviews.comments: My skin is always super dry, especially during the summer, so I always buy this closer to June and it does wonders every-time

reviews.headline: My favorite moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is my every day go to! I don't even want to wear makeup after putting this stuff on. Leaves my skin so perfect!

reviews.headline: Relieves Dry Skin
reviews.comments: Clinique moisture surge helps with dryness and plumbing lines. So light and fresh. There formula moisture surge is one of the best in the market.

reviews.headline: Moisture filled!
reviews.comments: This item is better than I hoped for. It soaks into my skin, and adds an extra layer of moisture. It's a perfect addition to my skin care regimen.

reviews.headline: Holy grail of moisture
reviews.comments: I am not a big fan of creams or lotions . No matter how light they claim to be it's still to heavy for my skin. This is serum like and absorbs nicely and make ur skin so incredibly soft. I will never be without this again

media.headline: I love how this product feels

faceoff_positive.comments: This is my second day using the product and it's so good that I'm already writing a review! I have dry patches on my cheeks and an oily t-zone. I was hesitant to try this product because I thought it would over hydrate my face and make my t-zone more oily than it already is since every moisturizer that I have tried does that. OMG, that was NOT the case with this one! I have never had a moisturizer that has perfectly hydrated my face and kept it oil-free. This product is it! I wake up and wash my face in the morning, removing and left overs of my night cream. I pat my face dry and apply the gel on my face in a light layer. I must say at first, its almost too light that I feel that I need to apply more but I don't. Then I wait about a minute and start my make-up routine. Let me also say that before using this product, no matter how much setting powder or setting spray or moisturizer I used, my skin would get oily in about 2 hours. Now, let me tell you that after using this product, by the end of the day, my oily t-zone was gone! I was shocked!!! I didn't have too blot or anything.! My face stayed sooo soft and nice all day. This thing is gold! Please give it a try if you have skin like mine! If not, just return it if it doesn't work for u lol. Hope this help!
faceoff_positive.headline: Please Try!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: So i am a true skincare/all beauty junkie. I have a serious problem with constantly buying skin products, to "help" and "clear" my very oily, sensitive, consistently clogged, face. I have tried so many creams, gels, face washes, toners, treatments (besides chemical peel) to help clear my skin. My issue is not your typical "Acne",but rather a face full of closed comedones. Closed comedones are the flesh colored bumps on your skin, that won't budge, won't pop, but makes your skin texture bumpy and rough. Open comedones are visible pimples, and cystic acne that can be popped, where as closed comedones can be squeezed, yet never pop. It's because the pore is completely blocked with oil, dirt, and sebum. Nothing has ever gotten rid of them, and I have tried everything high and low. Having closed comedones and sensitive, oily skin, I really have to watch what I put on my face. I have experimented many different gel hydrators, moisturizers, eat, because cream or lotion moisturizers break me out so bad, and just cause more closed comedones. I use the Clinique 3 step system for oily skin, which really doesn't improve my face neither, but still use it. When I used the sample of this Moisture surge, Hydrated concentrate, I literally fell in love with this stuff. The little deluxe sample lasted me for about a week. I used it twice a day, morning and night, and I finally thought I found the right product for my face, which was a miracle. I gave the rest of the sample to my grandmother, and told her to try it, while I went to ulta and bought the full size. Now that i have been using this consistently off and on, I can say this product is decent, but not amazing. I feel like the sample worked better on my skin, than the full sized I own. True, it does moisturize, and it does even out my oily skin and sebum production, but this does nothing for my texture (closed comedones) I figured using this consistently, I would see some type of improvement in my skin problems overall, but this didn't really do anything for it. Also, if you pop a pimple, don't put this on afterwards, because IT WILL BURN. With that being said, It is a good lightweight, gel moisturizer for oily and combination skin. If you have acne, or closed comedones all over your face like me, this does nothing for it. It doesn't make it worse neither, it just kinda sits there, and keeps your skin matte. It's also sticky a bit after you first apply it, which makes it great for a primer. I don't wear makeup alot (because makeup emphasizes texture) and that's the last thing I wanted people to see, But I'm an avid makeup collector too, and this is a nice primer for preapplication for your foundation. This is not a Savior. This stuff is not a miracle gel. It's just decent. That's the best word to describe it. This is a 100% accurate review, so if you have skin like me.. Now you know. I'm sure this would be wonderful for dry skin, combination skin, and even oily skin with no acne, or texture issues. Man, what I would do for a clear face. One day, I will find the answer. Until then, Ill keep trying and reviewing for all the skin care junkies out there like me, who struggle with acne, closed comedones, and oily skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Decent for Oily, Sensitive, Acne riddled skin.
